hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) ruled that the blood money should be paid by the near male relations from the father's side of the killer, and the such relatives of slain woman said: 'O Messenger of Allah (ﷺ),her legacy is for us.' He said: 'No, her legacy is for her husband and children.'”

chapter.ara-name: باب عَقْلُ الْمَرْأَةِ عَلَى عَصَبَتِهَا وَمِيرَاثُهَا لِوَلَدِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Blood Money Of A Woman (Who Kills Someone) Is Upon Her Male Potential Inheritors and Her Inheritance is For Her Child
